hours.!hours command: Queries the Stats DB for a user's logged hours
hours.Variable Notes: Get valid `<server id>` from the `!servers` command

kills.!kills command: Queries the Stats DB for a user's logged kills

deaths.!deaths command: Queries the Stats DB for a user's logged deaths
deaths.Variable Notes: Get valid `<server id>` from the `!servers` command

servers.!servers command: Lists all the servers that are tracked by this app as `id`: name

stats.!stats command: Provides a link to the web view of the SLbot stats server

commands.!commands command: Lists all the help messages for all the SLbot API commands

help.!help command: Lists all the help messages for all the SLbot API commands
